wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Jones (born 19 August 1934 in Aberdare, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales) is a retired Welsh track and field athlete. Jones represented Great Britain at three consecutive Summer Olympics, starting in 1960 (Rome, Italy).
